item.title: My husband will inherit $180K. I think we should invest the money. He wants to pay off his $168K mortgage. Who’s right?
item.description: “He has $15,000 in investments and $5,500 per month in disability income.”

item.title: Here’s why unemployment in software coding and programming is so high
item.description: Manpower’s stock has its worst day in 27 years as tariff uncertainty, acceleration in use of AI led to lower demand for permanent jobs.

item.title: My IRA had the biggest one-day gain ever. What will tomorrow bring?
item.description: “My personal trading account was also up 18% in one day.”

item.title: Supermodel Linda Evangelista is selling her NYC ‘industrial-cool chic loft’ for $8.19 million
item.description: The penthouse comes with a massive 2,500-square-foot roof terrace that boasts stunning city views.

item.title: My late uncle’s house is in foreclosure. A woman claims to be his daughter and my cousin is a squatter. What can we do?
item.description: “She keeps threatening to remove this nephew from the home.”
